name: Social Media Share Buttons and Link Shortener 4eq
author: saeed mohammadi

sections.description:
Social media plugin which lets you add share icons and is a powerful, extremely scalable and light weight url shortener tool introduced by 4eq.ir.
and you can add share icons for Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn,google pluse ,telegam and whatssap, white short link.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
e.g.
1. Extract the zip file and drop the contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
3. Place [smsbals4] in your pages
sections.faq:
how can install?

  1. Extract the zip file and drop the contents into the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [smsbals4] in your pages
